reviewtext: i bought these a the px 100's and girlfriend pick the px 100's i got these, i like the style and the sound is a huge step up from the ipod in ear phones. i also dig the warranty that koss gives these. i have to admit the sound is a little more defined on the sennhiesers(how do you spell it?) but the difference is not worth quibbling over. you will be happy with either pair, but the px 100s stay in place on her head better (ive got a bigger dome) so if you have a small head go for those.
